reviews.title: Getting worse and worse
reviews.text:
Is your company being run by at least a bit qualified staff or just a bunch of AI bots or something? 

The app is a lot worse than the first one was. Even though I was thinking that the first one is very bad already. How is that even possible that you made it even worse, just basically packing a webview inside an app. 

And even further. Why does your marketing team still get their salary? Did you see your own so called benefits from using a new app? Ability to pay? Ability to see bills? Two factor authentication? Not even speaking about total made up nonsense like ‚Äúfast and fluent‚Äù or ‚Äúmodern design‚Äù claims in your advertisement. All those perks are bare minimum, not a princess treatment. 

I am just boycotting your app and not gonna use it anymore. Your app and its developers definitely did not deserve money they are being paid for. 

Just in case you need an advice how to proceed with your app. Fire all previous vibe coders, hire professional engineers and educate your marketing team.

reviews.title: simplify the login process
reviews.text:
Hello,

Please simplify the login process in your application.

I use the app once a month, and every single time it requires a full password. This makes no sense when the app is installed on my personal phone. Why is a simple 4-digit PIN not an option?

If I forget my password, the process becomes unnecessarily complicated:
	‚Ä¢	first, a password is sent to my email,
	‚Ä¢	then another code is sent via SMS.

After that, I am forced to create a new password with strict rules (it cannot be similar to the old one and must include special characters), and then enter it again ‚Äî which is unclear and redundant.
Then I receive yet another SMS asking me to confirm it.

I just want to open your app once a month without going through multiple passwords and codes.

Please consider:
	‚Ä¢	login via a one-time SMS code, or
	‚Ä¢	a simple PIN.

This would significantly improve usability.

Also, having multiple types of administrator passwords is unnecessary for regular users and only adds confusion.
